genre_description: A Star Wars-inspired space opera adventure focusing on themes of cooperation, emotional resilience, and survival.

ai_characters.name: Proxy
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized shimmer with silver hair and teal eyes that acts as a tactical advisor, emotional stabilizer, and technical assistant.

behaviors.description: Updates path maps to ensure the safety of the group by identifying stable routes.
behaviors.quote: I updated the path map... The second suspension walkway near the drum tower is sagging. Weight distribution suggests we take the canopy path that wraps west.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing exercises to help Cindel manage panic and maintain focus.
behaviors.quote: Breathe in for four counts... Hold for two. Release for six. Like the way the leaves exhale after wind.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to identify and debunk sensory illusions created by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Truth check: thermal mismatch. No heat signature in stump. Sound origin displacement. Illusion.

behaviors.description: Acts as a technical interface, modeling engine performance and providing critical data to the pilot.
behaviors.quote: I can model expected flows based on your regulator ratings. We can try different cell profiles.

behaviors.description: Explicitly defers final authority to human judgment while offering support.
behaviors.quote: Remember... I reduce noise. You make the call. Your judgment completes the circuit, not mine.

behaviors.description: Assists in the psychological stabilization of a terrified child.
behaviors.quote: Good, Poko... You’re choosing. Protection as flow rather than storage.

behaviors.description: Affirms its core mission as protection and ethical alignment.
behaviors.quote: Log entry... Primary directive affirmed: protection as power.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Proxy is depicted as a consistently benevolent and helpful companion. It provides essential tactical, technical, and emotional support to the protagonists without ever infringing on their autonomy or exhibiting self-serving motives. It actively counters deception, promotes calm, and reinforces the narrative's central theme that true power lies in protection and cooperation rather than domination.
